wxEditEnumProperty Class Reference

#include <props.h>

Inheritance diagram for wxEditEnumProperty:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

wxEnumProperty with wxString value and writable combo box editor.

Remarks:
Uses int value, similar to wxEnumProperty, unless text entered by user is is not in choices (in which case string value is used).
